Courtesy: Custer-Gallatin National Forest | Facebook As featured on +2 Stillwater Trailhead reopens in Custer-Gallatin National Forest after 2022 flood repairs BOZEMAN, Mont. - The Stillwater Trailhead parking lot has reopened following repairs from se… Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Local Weather 1 Weather Alert See All > Weather Alert ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM FRIDAY TO 2 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys and Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...From 1 PM Friday to 2 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. && Currently in Missoula 62° Sunny62° / 33° 6 PM 61° 7 PM 56° 8 PM 52° 9 PM 49° 10 PM 46° 7-Day Radar Alerts Sign Up For Newsletters Success!
